title: Rand Paul’s Solution to LGBT Discrimination: Go Back in the Closet (Human Rights Campaign)
text: ( Source : Human Rights Campaign ) WASHINGTON - Today , the Human Rights Campaign ( HRC ), the nation's largest lesbian, gay, bisexual, and transgender ( LGBT) civil rights organization , responded to offensive comments by Sen. Rand Paul saying
